snippet: The Vatican met Tuesday with representatives of an association of American nuns that it had deemed to be too feminist.
abstract: Vatican meets with representatives of an association of American nuns that it had deemed to be too feminist.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican met Tuesday with representatives of an association of American nuns that it had deemed to be too feminist.

headline.main: The Vatican: U.S. Nuns Meet With Church Officials
headline.print_headline: The Vatican: U.S. Nuns Meet With Church Officials
